association.mission: To foster lifelong connections among Golden Stars alumni, support the school's mission, and create opportunities for networking, professional development, and giving back to the Golden Stars community.
benefits: Access to alumni network and professional connections
Invitations to exclusive alumni events and reunions
Access to school facilities (library, sports facilities)

events.title: Annual Alumni Reunion
events.description: A grand celebration bringing together alumni from all graduating classes for networking, reminiscing, and celebration.

events.title: Alumni Career Fair
events.description: Current students connect with alumni professionals for career guidance, internship opportunities, and networking.

events.title: Homecoming Weekend
events.description: A weekend of activities including sports competitions, cultural events, and special recognition ceremonies.

events.title: Alumni Giving Week
events.description: Annual fundraising campaign supporting scholarships, facility improvements, and student programs.

profiles.name: Dr. Nnemdi Emmanuella Osadunkwu
profiles.achievement: Graduated with First Class Honours in Neuroscience from University of Alberta, Canada. Published researcher in neuroplasticity.
profiles.quote: Golden Stars gave me the foundation to dream big and the discipline to achieve those dreams.

profiles.name: Adegoke Mary Oreoluwa
profiles.achievement: Graduated with First Class Honours in Law from University of Lagos. Winner of multiple academic awards.
profiles.quote: The values and work ethic instilled at Golden Stars continue to guide my professional journey.

profiles.name: Mbaraonye Ncheta Evans
profiles.achievement: Best WAEC Candidate in Lagos State 2024. Sidmach Prize winner.
profiles.quote: Golden Stars believed in me and pushed me to exceed my own expectations.

profiles.name: Ololade Naomi Olayinka
profiles.achievement: British Council Outstanding Cambridge Learners Award - Top in World, English as Second Language
profiles.quote: The teachers at Golden Stars went above and beyond to ensure we achieved excellence.

profiles.name: Chukwuma David Okonkwo
profiles.achievement: Founder of TechStart Nigeria, a leading tech education startup. Forbes 30 Under 30.
profiles.quote: Golden Stars taught me that with the right mindset, anything is possible.

profiles.name: Sarah Adebayo
profiles.achievement: Award-winning author and poet. Published three books before age 25.
profiles.quote: The creative writing program at Golden Stars sparked a passion that became my career.

giving.impact: Alumni contributions have funded scholarships, built new facilities, and supported programs that continue the Golden Stars legacy of excellence.

waysToGive.description: Unrestricted gifts supporting the school's greatest needs including scholarships, faculty development, and facility improvements.
Create or contribute to scholarship funds providing financial assistance to deserving students.
Major gifts can name classrooms, laboratories, or buildings in honor of individuals or families.
Direct support to specific programs such as sports, arts, or STEM initiatives.
